author: rmuir
msg: SOLR-2891: fix CompoundWordTokenFilter to not create invalid offsets when the length of the text was changed by a previous filter

author: jasha
msg: Setting the default locale should not have been in the test class but in the constructor of the MessageBundleController itself. Otherwise the resource bundle relies on the JVM locale which was nl_NL in my case, even if the browser sent a header for en_US. Our default properties file contains english messages.

author: rmuir
msg: SOLR-2891: fix CompoundWordTokenFilter to not create invalid offsets when the length of the text was changed by a previous filter
